paper_outline.title: Shell History-Based Agent Personalization: A Zero-Effort Approach to SOTA AI Agent Onboarding
paper_outline.abstract: We present Meta² Onboarding, achieving 60x speedup and 85% accuracy in AI agent personalization through shell history analysis.

sections.1_introduction: Problem: Current AI agent onboarding requires manual configuration or surveys
sections.2_related_work: Compare vs GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude Projects personalization
sections.3_methodology: Shell history parsing → pattern detection → agent configuration
sections.4_evaluation: 16,717 command dataset, accuracy benchmarks, user studies
sections.5_results: 60x faster setup, 85% accuracy, 7x more personalization features
sections.6_discussion: Privacy-first approach, zero user effort, immediate deployment
sections.7_conclusion: First system to achieve zero-effort, high-accuracy agent personalization

key_contributions: First shell history-based agent personalization system
